Headline: #72 North Temporary Reroute at North Ave/ Menard
ShortDescription: 72 North  buses are temp rerouted in both directions via North Ave, Central, Division, Austin and North Ave due to, police activity near North Ave/ Menard

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#72 North  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via North Ave, Central, Division, Austin and North Ave due to, police activity near North Ave/ Menard

Allow extra travel time.
